txt.en: You should return to Gondrad and tell him all that took place in the cellar at Bâr Nadhron.
Enter the Cellar in Bâr Nadhron
Enter the Variag Captain's camp attempt to trade the ransom for Glánhar's sons.
Go complete the ransom for Glánhar's sons with Jarl Akhiz in the cellar at Bâr Nadhron, in the Beacon Hills.
'So go we must - and by WE let me make clear that I mean YOU. I will wait here, and you are to whistle twice if you need me. I am only being cautious as I was bade!
The time has come to enter the cellar in Bâr Nadhron, in the Beacon Hills, and pay the ransom for Glánhar's sons.
Gondrad's eyes go wide as you relay all that took place. \n\n'It is well you went in and not I, at any rate. I would have made a mess of things, as I always seem to.'
You have scouted the Variag camp at Bâr Nadhron, and now one thing remains....
Enter the cellar in Bâr Nadhron
